scripts.build-css: node-sass dev/slidebars.css > dist/slidebars.css && node-sass dev/slidebars.css --output-style=compressed > dist/slidebars.min.css
scripts.build-js: uglifyjs dev/slidebars.js --comments "/^!/" --beautify -o dist/slidebars.js && uglifyjs dev/slidebars.js --comments "/^!/" -m -c -o dist/slidebars.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js
